ghcr.io/wxw-matt/devcontainer-features/c.command1: mkdir /medperf/ && chmod -R a+rwx /medperf && git clone --branch codespaces https://github.com/VukW/medperf.git /medperf/
ghcr.io/wxw-matt/devcontainer-features/c.command2: echo working_dir_$(pwd) && cd /medperf/ && pip install -e ./cli && pip install -r server/requirements.txt && pip install -r server/test-requirements.txt
ghcr.io/wxw-matt/devcontainer-features/c.command3: echo working_dir_$(pwd) && medperf profile activate local
ghcr.io/wxw-matt/devcontainer-features/c.command4: echo working_dir_$(pwd) && cd /medperf/server && cp .env.local.local-auth .env && medperf auth login -e testmo@example.com
